snippet: N.H.L. general managers are expected to consider several possible rules changes for safety, including restoring the ban on two-line passes and adopting a hybrid icing rule.
abstract: N.H.L. general managers are expected to consider several possible rules changes for safety, including restoring the ban on two-line passes and adopting a hybrid icing rule.

byline.original: By JEFF Z. KLEIN and STU HACKEL

headline.main: Rule Changes Could Put Safety Ahead of Speed
